title: Monitor Sale Prices With This Google Chrome App
text:
If you're interested in buying something online but the price is just a little too expensive for you right now, the PriceAlert Chrome extension can track that items and let you know when the price gets low enough for you to bite the bullet and make the purchase.

Unlike other apps that let you know when the price drops, the menu bar app specifically lets you know when the price drops down below a price limit you set.

For instance, if something is currently on $100 and you're only willing to pay $75, you can set an alert for that.

It's not the right solution for everything, but it can definitely come in handy for those expensive items that you know are going to drop in price soon, but you don't want to remember to check them every single day.
